references.paper_title: Community Detection and Stochastic Block Models: Recent Developments
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of community detection and stochastic block models, which serves as foundational knowledge for the current research.

references.paper_title: Exact Recovery in the Stochastic Block Model
references.reason: This paper establishes the information-theoretic threshold for exact community recovery in the stochastic block model, a fundamental result that the current work builds upon and extends.

references.paper_title: Exact Community Recovery in Correlated Stochastic Block Models
references.reason: This directly precedes the current work and poses the open question that this paper answers regarding the information-theoretic limits of community recovery with more than two graphs.

references.paper_title: Correlated Stochastic Block Models: Exact Graph Matching with Applications to Recovering Communities
references.reason: This paper initiates the study of community recovery in correlated stochastic block models, laying groundwork for the current work by establishing information-theoretic limits for exact graph matching.

references.paper_title: Consistency thresholds for the planted bisection model
references.reason: This paper provides crucial techniques and results regarding the consistency threshold for community recovery in the planted bisection model, which are essential for analyzing the community recovery problem in correlated networks.
